system.description:
Choose Crossbow bolts, arrows, spear gun spears, .68 caliber paintball rounds, 18mm less lethal rounds, throwing knives/stars, javelins, boomerangs bolas, glaves, throwing axes, bricks, or giant throwing stars

Prerequisites

Proficient with weapon that fires selected projectile or with specific thrown weapon.

Benefits

When firing a weapon that uses the chosen projectile, it grants an additional die of damage. When Enchanting ammunition of this type, reduce the SP cost of the spell by 2.

Special

A character may take this feat multiple times. Each time the character takes the feat, they select a different projectile type.
system.summary: +1 damage die for chosen projectile, bonuses to enchanting.
